descriptor.name: Haldiram'S Aloo Bhujia - Small
descriptor.short_desc: Haldiram's Aloo Bhujia, available in a small-sized pack, is a popular Indian snack known for its delightful and savory flavor. Aloo Bhujia is typically made from ingredients like chickpea flour, potatoes, and spices, resulting in a crispy and flavorful snack. This small-sized pack offers a convenient portion for snacking and is perfect for those who enjoy the traditional and spicy taste of Aloo Bhujia, which is a popular accompaniment to tea or a crunchy snack on its own. Haldiram's is a well-recognized brand known for its range of snacks and Indian sweets.
descriptor.long_desc: Haldiram's Aloo Bhujia, available in a small-sized pack, is a popular Indian snack known for its delightful and savory flavor. Aloo Bhujia is typically made from ingredients like chickpea flour, potatoes, and spices, resulting in a crispy and flavorful snack. This small-sized pack offers a convenient portion for snacking and is perfect for those who enjoy the traditional and spicy taste of Aloo Bhujia, which is a popular accompaniment to tea or a crunchy snack on its own. Haldiram's is a well-recognized brand known for its range of snacks and Indian sweets.

descriptor.name: Parle 20 20 Cashew Cookies - 200 Gm
descriptor.short_desc: PARLE 20-20 Cashew Cookies, delicious and crunchy snacks with cashew nuts.
descriptor.long_desc: PARLE 20-20 Cashew Cookies are delicious and crunchy snacks that include the goodness of cashew nuts. Impeccable for any time of the day, these cookies provide a rich and satisfying taste that leaves you wanting more. Perfect for tea-time or just a quick snack, these cookies bring joy with every bite.

descriptor.name: Haldiram's Chana Nuts 100G
descriptor.short_desc: Step into a world of culinary delights and nourishment with our extensive selection of groceries. Explore aisles filled with fresh produce bursting with vibrant colors and flavors, hand-picked to bring nature's bounty to your table. From pantry staples that form the foundation of every meal to exotic ingredients that ignite your taste buds, our grocery collection caters to every culinary need.
